input.value: Data Governance, Manage, HealthCare, Framework, Data Architecture

div.div: Data Governance, Manage, HealthCare, Framework, Data Architecture

div.span: Contract Corp-To-Corp, C2H Corp-To-Corp, Long Term

ul.li: Provide hands-on analytic consulting to healthcare clients
Work with internal team and manage them on the projects
Manage, monitor and recommend appropriate strategies, tactics and operational initiatives to continuously enhance client satisfaction
Assist with the development, documentation and presentation of results to clients
Demonstrable experience in and commitment to the healthcare analytics industry within a clinical setting
Strong knowledge of data and analytics trends, competitive landscape, and latest industry news and trends
Demonstrable analytical, interpretative and problem-solving skills
Experience working in sizable/ multi-disciplined teams and leading staff
Strong communication skills with a data-driven approach to solving complex challenges
Knowledge of key issues and current developments in the healthcare industries
Establish and govern an enterprise data governance implementation roadmap including strategic priorities for development of information-based capabilities

Roll out an enterprise wide data governance framework, with a focus on improvement of data quality and the protection of sensitive data through modifications to organization behavior policies and standards, principles, governance metrics, processes, related tools and data architecture
5+ years (healthcare consulting, data & analytics) or MBA preferably with
healthcare/analytics emphasis/ coursework or prior experience
Experience working on Data Governance, Organizational Structure and/or Enterprise
